author: jstrachan
msg: added the ability to configure the DLQ policy on a per destination basis; either use 1 global DLQ for all messages or use 1 DLQ for a bunch of messages via a wildcard PolicyEntry or use an individual DLQ per destination (which again can be attached to a wildcard via a PolicyEntry)

author: jochen
msg: A missing increment in LiteXmlRpcTransport.initConnection() prevented, that the method could finally fail, resulting in a never ending loop.

author: jochen
msg: A missing increment in LiteXmlRpcTransport.initConnection() prevented, that the method could finally fail, resulting in a never ending loop.
